alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Alamosa, southeastern Rio Grande, southeastern Saguache and northeastern Conejos Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 645 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monte Vista, or 12 miles west of Alamosa, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Monte Vista around 655 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mosca. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft
